item.description:
***** You may call the Liberty Hotel at (617) 224-4000 to confirm if the movie is cancelled
Read the last paragraph on this page to find out Plan B *****


Let's meet up at the Liberty Hotel in The Yard again for drinks and/or a movie.

FREE film with complimentary popcorn and pop chips as well as cash bar with movie candy for sale.

RSVP by emailing moviemondays@libertyhotel.com, so appropriate seating is arranged

As always, get there when you can and stay as long or short as you're able.

This weather forecast for this Monday evening is ideal to be outside and hang out in this cool setting...enjoying the company of friendly fun folks. The movie begins close to 7:45 PM.

Tonight's film is Superbad a comedy, with the following plot Seth and Evan are best friends, inseparable, navigating the last weeks of high school. Usually shunned by the popular kids, Seth and Evan luck into an invitation to a party, and spend a long day, with the help of their nerdy friend Fogell, trying to score enough alcohol to lubricate the party and inebriate two girls, Jules and Becca, so they can kick-start their sex lives and go off to college with a summer full of experience and new skills. Their quest is complicated by Fogell's falling in with two inept cops who both slow and assist the plan. If they do get the liquor to the party, what then? Is sex the only rite of passage at hand? Written by


Event Flyer

Courtyard Menu

Cocktail Menu

Check out MBTA or Hop Stop to create your route by public transit. Charles/MGH (red line) is the closest subway station and steps away. Government (green & blue lines) subway station is less than a ten (10) minute walk.

PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU ORDER - THANK YOU

If the movie is cancelled the drinking, meeting and chatting will be held in the Liberty Lobby Bar located at the top of the escalators. You'll find me seated at a table with a deck of playing cards.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask the doorman at the hotel entrance to direct you to the Courtyard...find me seated nearest the screen with a deck of playing cards on a side table.
item.name: Drinks and/or a Movie at Liberty Hotel - Monday August 30th
